name: Taamul – WordPress Feedback Modal Plugin
author: Taamul

sections.description:
Taamul is a simple widget that allows your visitors an easy way to leave instant visual feedback on your WordPress website through the fixed floating contact button. Getting timely feedback from visitors/customers is necessary for understanding problems that need to be solved, what customers love, and hate, identifying issues, and what should be improved.‚ú®

üöÄ Live Demo | üåê taamul.com | üõü Get Support

Consumer or Visitor feedback plays a major role. Powerful feedback encourages individuals to realize what they did well and what they could do great.

It is an essential plugin for everyone wanting to grow and succeed. People who take the time to voice their opinions and share their experiences have an invaluable impact on the success of your website, products, and services. Analyzing visitor/customer feedback also helps businesses create a deeper bond with their visitors/customers while increasing their engagement and loyalty to the brand. With data-driven insights and actionable advice, companies are able to make informed decisions and take the necessary steps to improve their services and products.

Features

  • Quick & Easy Customizable
  • Fully Responsive
  • Multisite Compatible
  • Submissions Archive & Exporting
  • Email Notifications
  • Device Visibility
  • Customizable Positions & Messages
  • Tested with Latest WordPress
  • Lightweight & Fast Performance
  • Cross Browser Compatible
  • Friendly Support & much more!…

At Taamul, we are dedicated to providing the best user experience for our plugin. To that end, we are continually striving to improve our plugin and make it even better for our users. We welcome any feedback or suggestions you may have to help us reach this goal. Your input is valuable to us and we are always open to your ideas.üí°
sections.installation:
First download the the plugin ZIP file.

1.) Log into your website administration panel.
2.) Then go to Plugins page Add New > Upload Plugin .
3.) Click “Choose file” then select the plugin .zip file.
4.) Then Install and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Is Taamul Feedback Plugin Free?

Yes. It is free.

Do I need an account?

No.

Can I Export Feedback Form Submissions?

Yes, Taamul makes it easy to export your feedback modal submissions data to CSV or JSON formats.

Can Customized Taamul Feedback Modal?

Yes. A lot of options are available to modified position and appearance.

Do I will be Notified When a Feedback was Received?

Yes. You can enable or disable email notifications.

Other questions or feedback?

Found any bugs? Have some feedback or idea? Please contact us here: https://taamul.com/contact/

  • Update: JavaScript

1.0.1 – 17 April, 2021

1.0.0

  • Launch!

short_description: The best WordPress feedback modal plugin. The simplest way to collect user feedback, right on your website using floating contact button.
